content: Tier 1 Support (First Line Support) handles initial customer contact for all inquiries. Responsibilities: Account inquiries, balance checks, plan information, basic troubleshooting, bill payments, package activations, SIM-related queries, general information. Average handling time: 3-5 minutes. Resolution target: 70% first-call resolution.

Tier 1 Support can help with: Check account balance and usage, Explain bills and charges, Process payments, Activate/deactivate packages, Reset voicemail PIN, Update contact information, Explain service features, Troubleshoot basic connectivity issues, Register complaints, Schedule callbacks.

Tier 2 Support (Technical Support) handles escalated technical issues that require deeper investigation. Responsibilities: Network connectivity issues, Speed problems, Router/modem configuration, Advanced troubleshooting, Service outage verification, Technical complaint handling. Average handling time: 10-15 minutes.

Tier 2 Support can help with: Diagnose network connectivity issues, Remote router configuration, Speed test analysis, Identify service outages in your area, Coordinate with field technicians, Resolve complex billing disputes, Handle plan migration issues, Technical device support, Schedule technician visits.

Tier 3 Support (Specialist Support) handles complex technical issues requiring specialized expertise. Responsibilities: Infrastructure-related issues, Persistent network problems, Advanced configurations, Enterprise solutions, Integration issues. Customers are not directly connected to Tier 3; issues are escalated internally.

Field Technicians provide on-site support for issues that cannot be resolved remotely. Services include: New connection installations, Router/ONT installations, Line fault repairs, Equipment replacement, Signal optimization, FTTH fiber termination, Outdoor unit installations. Scheduling: Appointments available 7 days a week. Standard slots: Morning (8 AM-12 PM), Afternoon (1 PM-5 PM).

Issue escalation follows a structured process: Level 1 → Level 2: Automatic if issue unresolved after 15 minutes or requires technical expertise. Level 2 → Level 3: For infrastructure issues, persistent problems, or issues requiring backend changes. Level 2 → Field: When on-site visit is required. Timeline: Tier 2 escalations within 2 hours, Tier 3 within 24 hours, Field visits within 48 hours (72 hours for rural areas).

Enterprise Support provides dedicated assistance for corporate customers. Features: Priority queue, Dedicated account team, 24/7 availability for critical issues, Proactive monitoring for enterprise circuits, SLA-backed response times, On-site support for critical infrastructure. Contact: Enterprise customers use dedicated hotline 1237.

Complaint handling process: 1) Complaint registered with unique reference number. 2) Categorized by type (Billing, Technical, Service). 3) Assigned to appropriate team. 4) Investigation within 24-48 hours. 5) Resolution or update provided. 6) Customer confirmation and closure. Escalation: Unresolved complaints escalated to supervisory level after 72 hours. For urgent matters, request supervisor callback.

LankaTel maintains service quality through: Call monitoring for quality assurance, Customer satisfaction surveys after interactions, Regular training updates for support staff, Performance metrics tracking (response time, resolution rate, customer satisfaction), Continuous improvement based on feedback.
